mapper.select: SELECT influencer.influencer_id AS userId, user.user_name AS name, user.user_email AS email, user.user_phone AS phone, channel.channel_name AS snsChannelName, channel.channel_url AS snsLink FROM user JOIN influencer ON user.user_id = influencer.user_id JOIN channel ON channel.influencer_id = influencer.influencer_id;

SELECT influencer.influencer_id AS userId, user.user_name AS name, user.user_email AS email, user.user_phone AS phone, channel.channel_name AS snsChannelName, channel.channel_url AS snsLink FROM user JOIN influencer ON user.user_id = influencer.user_id JOIN channel ON channel.influencer_id = influencer.influencer_id
WHERE 1 = 1
AND TRIM(LOWER(influencer.influencer_id)) = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND TRIM(LOWER(user.user_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{keyword}))
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user.user_email), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user.user_phone), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND REPLACE(TRIM(channel.channel_name), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{keyword}), '-', '')
AND TRIM(channel.channel_url) = TRIM(#{keyword})
-- 기본 검색 없음

SELECT influencer.influencer_id AS userId, user.user_name AS name, user.user_email AS email, user.user_phone AS phone, channel.channel_name AS snsChannelName, channel.channel_url AS snsLink, user.user_id AS userCursor FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user WHERE user_role = 'ROLE_INFLUENCER'
AND TRIM(LOWER(user_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{searchDTO.keyword}))
AND TRIM(LOWER(user_email)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{searchDTO.keyword}))
AND REPLACE(TRIM(user_phone), '-', '') = REPLACE(TRIM(#{searchDTO.keyword}), '-', '')
-- 기본 검색 없음
AND user_id > #{cursor}
ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT #{size} ) AS temp JOIN influencer ON influencer.user_id = temp.user_id JOIN user ON user.user_id = influencer.user_id JOIN ( SELECT channel.influencer_id, MIN(channel.channel_name) AS channel_name, MIN(channel.channel_url) AS channel_url FROM channel GROUP BY channel.influencer_id ) AS channel ON channel.influencer_id = influencer.influencer_id
